Texts.Eng: Bring a ^green;Regen Gene^reset; to ^orange;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Texts.Chs: 把^orange;再生基因^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。

Texts.Eng: My ^orange;Xeno Lab^reset; is on the fritz and I need ^orange;1 Regen Gene^reset; to complete my work and get it ready for an event! Can you help me out?
Texts.Chs: 我的^orange;基因提取设备^reset;坏掉了，我现在急需一份^green;再生基因^reset;才能完成我的工作，你能帮帮我吗？

Texts.Eng: Thanks to you, the symposium will be a success! As gratitude, have this instrument of brutal and calculated murder.
Texts.Chs: 非常感谢你，有了我的帮忙我的实验才能成功。
